entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow mixed with ice pellets ending early this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
